about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Winny Immigration and Education Services Ltd. is primarily involved in the visa consultancy business. The company assists individuals for study, travel, work, business, and migration purposes.

The company has assisted thousands of clients with immigration and visa processes, providing visa consultancy. With decades of experience and a network of 12 strategically located offices, they have effectively guided many clients through these complex procedures.

Winny offers visa guidance, immigration assistance, and documentation services.

The company provides consultations for the following services:

1. Training for Language Proficiency Examinations,

2. Consulting and processing a variety of Temporary Residence Visas,

3. Consulting and processing Permanent Residency Visas.

The company has 12 offices in Gujarat, Maharashtra, and Delhi, including branches, franchisees, and a virtual office in Canada.

As of March 31, 2024, the company has employed around 145 employees at various levels of the Organization.

faqs.question: What is the Winny Immigration IPO?
faqs.answer:
Winny Immigration IPO is a SME IPO of 652000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹9.13 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹140 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on June 20, 2024, and closes on June 24, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Winny Immigration IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Winny Immigration IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Winny Immigration IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Winny Immigration IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Winny Immigration IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Winny Immigration IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Winny Immigration IPO opens on June 20, 2024 and closes on June 24, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Winny Immigration IPO?
faqs.answer: Winny Immigration IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Winny Immigration IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Winny Immigration IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Winny Immigration IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Winny Immigration IPO will be done on Tuesday, June 25, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, June 26, 2024. Check the Winny Immigration IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Winny Immigration IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Winny Immigration IPO listing date is on Thursday, June 27, 2024.
